item.title: 317 Character Models Upgrade?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

You will need to change the model header, load all of the new animations (unless you feel like re-animating every item into the 317 format), and a couple other things I dont remember. Its not just as easy as drag and drop. Its one of those things that, if you have to ask, you probably shouldn’t be trying to do it.

Read full topic
